Mesibo API Use Cases

Here are some examples of Mesibo API Use cases.

 

COMMUNICATION

Use mesibo to add real-time communication to your app and website in just a few hours

One on One Messaging

Integrate mesibo’s one-on-one messaging APIs to enable your users to start communicating instantly.

Group Chat

Make your app or web a global platform for interacting with like minded or closely related. Integrate mesibo’s group chat API and start texting and messaging with one to many.

Voice & Video Call

Use mesibo’s voice and video APIs to enable users to make live audio and video conversation.

 

Enterprise & Team Communication

Branded communication apps for your small-to-large enterprises and team with your own enterprise authentication.

Enterprise Communication

Create a communication app for all your employees in your enterprise environment - using your own enterprise authentication, servers, and firewalls ensure ultimate privacy whether it's chat, voice or video calls.

Team Collaboration

Allow teams to collaborate - to share their ideas, updates, status reports, work assignments and more.

Use App Stores

Unlike other apps like Slack where you have to use their app, mesibo gives your own app which you can even upload to various app stores like Apple, Google, Amazon for your employees to download in the most obvious manner.

 

WebRTC

Add WebRTC voice and video calling into your app.

WebRTC Signalling

WebRTC is an amazing way to add voice and video to your app. However to setup a WebRTC session, it requires signalling channel to exchange session control messages (SDPs). mesibo's low latency, reliable messaging provides an ideal signalling platform for WebRTC.

Media Handling

Mesibo offers turn server and also let you set up other WebRTC protocols like STUN, TURN to handle global media handling.

 

Real-time artificial intelligence (AI) interface

A reliable, low latency interface to your AI engines

Connect your data source in real-time

Machine learning and artificial intelligence are transforming almost every field; customer support, predictions, search, etc.., and open solutions from Google, Amazon, Microsoft makes it even easier for apps to integrate AI in their own system. Most AI services are meaningful when they process real-time input data and send processed output data in real-time. This is where mesibo helps, by delivering input data from your users to your AI backend and back with ultra low latency and guaranteed delivery.

 

Sales & Customer support

Increase the team productivity and customer satisfaction

Pre and Post Sales Support

It was found that live chat has the highest satisfaction levels (73%) compared to any other customer service channel, 63% for email and 44% of the phone. Adding it to your website and app will certainly make your buyer feel more confident in pre-sales as well as post-sales support.

Purchase Assistance

Help with your online buyers in making informed decisions by live chat, voice or video interactions. It was also found effective to offer live chat proactively if customers linger on the page.

 

Dating & Matrimonial

Specialized communication needs

Paired/Associative Chat

Allowing communication only if both the parties agree to chat and continue to agree.

Alias

Hide contact details by creating an alias which can be deleted anytime to remove the communication channel, to ensure only interested parties can stay connected.

Location Based Matching

Let the user find the other one based on location proximity.

 

Anonymous Communication

Another specialized communication type.

Anonymous Chat

Create a platform for strangers to meet and communicate via chat, audio or video calls.

Anonymous Chat Rooms

Create Anonymous chat rooms to get feedback, discussions on burning issues, or anything you like to keep anonymous.

 

Gaming

Add interactivity to your games.

Player Chat

Add more excitement and make your virtual game a live playground for players. Allow real-time chat among one on one or one to many players to feel the thrill.

Multiplayer

Enable multiplayer capabilities in your games by sending and receiving player action in real-time, for example, shooting, chess moves, coordinates etc.

 

Education

Make distance learning, immersive

Virtual Learning

Use mesibo’s API to transmit multimedia class content in real-time to students having mobiles, tablets, computers etc.

Q&A Sessions

Make your sessions immersive by adding live chat, voice and video interactions. mesibo’s real-time chat API makes it quick and easy for you, and can scale to your needs.

Recorded Broadcasting

Not all students learn at the same pace or having same timeslots. Allow your students to access recorded sessions from whatever device they are using .

 

Healthcare

Provide cost effective solutions to remote patients

Across the World

Provide a platform for doctors and patient to interact face-to-face across the world using mesibo's chat, voice and video API.

Remote Diagnostic

Send the test reports, high resolution scans, ECG etc., to doctors and get diagnostic reports, allow them to discuss, everything in real-time, just like a patient and a doctor sitting across the table.

Post-diagnostic Support & Follow-up

Follow-up with patients or let patients follow up with doctors for any queries - shows you care.

 

Banking & Financial Services

Provide a highly secured environment for financial transactions

Account Support

Provide live customer support for the smooth operating of their accounts and increase the satisfaction level. Offer personalized one-to-one assistance for complex transactions.

Transaction Notifications

Keep your customers safe. Update your customers with the real-time transaction alert as and when they transact.

Portfolio Updates

Keep your users stay tuned with the real-time stock market, fund updates. Provide real-time assistance to manage the investment portfolio profitably.

 

E-commerce

Provide personalised shopping experience

Pre and Post Sales Support

It was found that live chat has the highest satisfaction levels (73%) compared to any other customer service channel, 63% for email and 44% for the phone. Adding it to your website and app will certainly make your buyer feel more confident in pre-sales as well as post-sales support.

Personalised Shopping

Help with your online buyers in making informed decisions by live chat, voice or video interactions. It was also found effective to offer live chat proactively if customers linger on the page.

 

Media & Entertainment

Create a live platform to engage your audience

Real-time News

Not only reach your audience in real-time with happening events, but let your audience reach you about events around them worth making a news.

Broadcast Event

Broadcasting live events to a large audience by using mesibo’s platform.

Fan Engagement

Let celebrities engage with their fans across the globe by live events, or online Meetup sessions.

 

Sports

Let your users feel the thrill of real-time sports events

Live Matches

Broadcast live streaming of the sport events to keep your users engaged.

Score Update

Make your app or web a live scoreboard. Keep on updating with the game scores in real-time and let your app users enjoy the game without missing even a bit.

Social Interaction

Let your app or web be the real-time platform for the sports lovers to discuss their favourite sports.

Get started in just 5 minutes

No credit card, No trial period. Just sign up and start building your real-time apps now.
Reach us at contact@mesibo.com if you need any assistance.
